[Onadere's Head](/onaderesHead/) (upon death) |internalname = CHA_CRE_Siren_Bounty |guid = ee80c534-3a84-4466-94c6-d255f6e25ccf }} '''Onadere the Temptress''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background A [siren](/siren/) has been steering ships into the rocks. Survivor accounts tell of Onadere haunting the western isles of the great [Kua o Rikuhu](/kuaORikuhuIslands/) chain. Killing her will ensure safer passage for ships and earn a hefty bounty. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved =[Bounty - Onadere the Siren](/bountyOnadereTheSiren/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [Bounty - Onadere the Siren](/bountyOnadereTheSiren/): Is the target of the bounty.
